room_title: Escape room "Indiana and the Buried Key" by Unlock Escape Rooms in Fresno
room_description:
In the 1920's, a young Egyptian boy found a 4000-year-old clay tablet and a spectacular golden amulet.  The tablet appeared to be from the entrance of an unknown tomb - the tomb of an Egyptian Pharaoh!

The area was excavated by world famous archeologist and explorer, Indiana. There he discovered the secret underground passage leading into a tomb!  However, it proved to be Indiana's last adventure...

After entering the passage, Indiana was never heard from again. Since then, a few have tried to locate the tomb, but they too were never head from again. Legend says that you need a Pharaoh's sacred Scarab Beetle to help you escape.

Do you dare to try to discover the secret entrance? It is known that Indiana's hat always returns... will you?
